distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for mailman fixes the following issues:
	  
- CVE-2019-3693: Fixed a local privilege escalation from wwwrun to root (bsc#1154328).
notes.title: Description of the patch

full_product_name.name: mailman-2.1.17-3.11.1.x86_64 as component of SUSE Enterprise Storage 5

notes.text: A symlink following vulnerability in the packaging of mailman in SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12; openSUSE Leap 15.1 allowed local attackers to escalate their privileges from user wwwrun to root. Additionally arbitrary files could be changed to group mailman. This issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 mailman versions prior to 2.1.15-9.6.15.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 mailman versions prior to 2.1.17-3.11.1. openSUSE Leap 15.1 mailman version 2.1.29-lp151.2.14 and prior versions.
notes.title: CVE description
